readable.title: 2874728371_ccd6db87f3
readable.content: A large brown dog and a small black dog stand near each other on a dirt patch surrounding by grass and weeds . A large brown dog and a small grey dog on a rocky surface with weeds behind them . A large brown dog has his noce on the back of a small black dog . A small black dog is shocked when a larger brown dog gives him a sniff . The brown dog sniffs the back of a smaller black dog .
